title: Zamorak godsword (or)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Zamorak godsword (or) is a Zamorak godsword with a Zamorak godsword ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the godsword. It costs 4,935,102 for both the parts to make the Zamorak godsword (or).

The Zamorak godsword (or) is a Zamorak godsword with a Zamorak godsword ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the godsword. It costs 4,935,102 for both the parts to make the Zamorak godsword (or).

While the godsword is untradeable in its ornamented state, it can be dismantled anytime, returning the tradeable godsword and ornament kit.
